GSP33brssbh3u:332: tatra tāvadāhuḥ - iṣṭādikāriṇa eva candramasaṃ gacchantītyetanna /
GSP33brssbh3u:335: ethāhyaviśeṣeṇa kauṣītakinaḥ samāmananti- 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' (kauṣī. 1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:338: iṣṭādikāriṇāmitareṣāṃ ca samānagatitvaṃ na yuktamiti cet /
GSP33brssbh3u:342: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt | BBs_3,1.13 |
GSP33brssbh3u:348: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssbh3u:351: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssbh3u:354: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham /
GSP33brssbh3u:355: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:356: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām' ityevañjātīyakaṃ ca bahveva yamavaśyatāprāptiliṅgaṃ bhavati // 13 //
GSP33brssbh3u:359: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu // 14 //
GSP33brssbh3u:362: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:366: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:371: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssbh3u:375: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:376: jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:380: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssbh3u:381: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:382: 'iṣṭāpūrte dattam' (chā. 5.10.1,3) iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:384: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:387: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:390: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:391: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:396: śrutistu tṛtīyasthānasaṃkīrtanenāsaṃpūraṇaṃ darśayati- 'etattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:401: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssbh3u:407: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:409: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:413: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:415: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:422: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:424: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssbh3u:427: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:432: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijjam' (chā. 6.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:433: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:439: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ // 21 //
GSP33brssbh3u:447_1: vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:455: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:456: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:476: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssbh3u:480: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:487: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:489: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:497: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:498: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:500: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:508: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssbh3u:510: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:511: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:512: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:520: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt | BBs_3,1.25 |
GSP33brssbh3u:521: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:523: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:525: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:526: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:527: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:528: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:534: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:540_1: retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:548: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram - ''tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ' (chāya 5.10.7) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:549: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:557: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:560: ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:561: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:563: saṃdhyamiti svapnānamācaṣṭe, vede prayogadarśanāt 'saṃdhyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ svapnasthānam' (bṛ. 4.3.9) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:566: kutaḥ - yataḥ pramāṇabhūtā śrutirevamāha 'atha rathānnathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4,3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:570: apicaike śākhino 'sminneva saṃdhye sthāne kāmānāṃ nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:571: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:576: iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:579: ityādi, tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:580: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:581: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:582: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:603: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:604: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:605: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:606: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:607: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:609: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati' ityupakramya 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:611: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:613: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:615: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:617: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssbh3u:621: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate manuṣyo 'yamiti nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena vṛkṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:622: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:629: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ | BBs_3,2.4 |
GSP33brssbh3u:633: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:635: tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:636: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:638: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh3u:641: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:644: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:647: apica jāgarite viṣayendriyasaṃyogādādityādijyotirvyatikarāccātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ durvivecanamiti tadvivecanāya svapna upanyastaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:648: tatra yadi rathādisṛṣcivacanaṃ śrutyā nīyeta tadā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na nirṇītaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:649: tasmādrathādyabhāvavacanaṃ śrutyā rathādisṛṣṭivacanaṃ tu bhaktyeti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:653: śrutyantare 'svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā jyotiṣā prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9)
GSP33brssbh3u:655: ihāpi 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti' (ka. 5.8) iti prasiddhānuvajjīva evāyaṃ kāmānāṃ nirmātā saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:656: tasya tu vākyaśeṣeṇa tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahmeti jīvabhāvaṃ vyāvartya brahmabhāva upadiśyate - 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.9.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:668: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau | BBs_3,2.5 |
GSP33brssbh3u:670: tatraivaṃ sati yathāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ samāne dahanaprakāśanaśaktī bhavata evaṃ jīveśvarayorapi jñānaiśvaryaśaktī,
GSP33brssbh3u:677: kutaḥ - tato hīśvarāddhetorasya jīvasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:679: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'jñātvā devaṃ sarvapāśāpahāniḥ kṣīṇaiḥ kleśairjanmamṛtyuprahāṇiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:680: tasyābhidhyānāttṛtīyaṃ dehabhede viśvaiśvaryaṃ kevala āptakāmaḥ' (śve. 1.11) ityevamādyā // 5 //
GSP33brssbh3u:688: asti cātropamā yathāgnerdahanaprakāśanasaṃpannasyāpyaraṇitasya dahanaprakāśane tirohite bhavato yathā vā bhasmacchannasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:691: nanvasya eva jīva īśvarādastu tiraskṛtajñānaiśvaryatvātkiṃ dehayogakalpanayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:696: 'tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.9.4) iti ca jīvāyopadiśatīśvarātmatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:698: ataśca na sāṃkalpikī jīvasya svapne rathādisṛṣṭirghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh3u:699: yadi ca sāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭiḥ syānnaivāniṣṭaṃ kaścitsvapnaṃ paśyet /
GSP33brssbh3u:701: yatpunaruktaṃ jāgaritadeśaśrutiḥ svapnasya satyatvaṃ sthāpayatīti na tatsāmyavacanaṃ satyatvābhiprāyaṃ svayañjyotiṣṭvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:707: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca | BBs_3,2.7 |
GSP33brssbh3u:710: kvacicchrūyate- 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyāsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpo bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:711: anyatra tu nāḍīrevānukramya śrūyate - 'tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:712: tathānyatra nāḍīrevānukramya 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:714: tathānyatra 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:715: 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariśvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:716: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimetāni nāḍyādīni parasparanirapekṣāṇi bhinnāni suṣuptisthānānyāhosvitparasparāpekṣayaikaṃ suṣuptisthānamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:720: nāḍyādīnāṃ tvekārthatā suṣuptau dṛśyate - 'nāḍīśu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) 'purītati śete'
